description.short: Dynamic range processor for controlling signal level.
description.detailed: The Logic Pro Compressor reduces dynamic range by attenuating audio signals that exceed a set threshold, helping maintain consistent levels.

when_to_use: Control dynamic range of vocal recordings
Reduce sudden peaks in vocal performance

signal_chain.recommended_position: After corrective EQ and before saturation or time-based effects

workflow_tips: Avoid excessive gain reduction to maintain natural dynamics
Use make-up gain carefully to prevent loudness bias
